step_data.thought: Looking at the current page and my goal, I notice that I'm already on the Design Configuration page. The page title in the accessibility tree shows 'Design Configuration / Design / Content / Magento Admin' and there's a heading element [682] that says 'Design Configuration'. The page shows a table with different store views and their theme configurations.\n\nSince I'm already on the Design Configuration page, my goal has been accomplished. I should inform the user that we've successfully reached the Design Configuration page.
step_data.action: stop('You are already on the Design Configuration page. This page shows the theme configurations for different store views in your Magento installation.')
